subject: BLOCKED: S06 Leave Server - Same Infrastructure Issue as S04

critical_findings: Application stuck on permanent Loading... screen
Same issue found in S04 L2 validation
All acceptance criteria FAIL due to app not loading
24 screenshots confirm consistent failure across all viewports
content.pattern_identified: Both S04 and S06 L2 validations blocked by identical app loading failure
content.recommended_action: Investigate DEF-003 fix status - may have regressed or deployment issue
content.notes: Worker methodology was sound. Infrastructure problem preventing all validation.
